title: Add a torch.matmul function and document broadcast behavior of it and delegated functions
body_html:
See #1563 (comment) for context.

This will include the following changes:

  1. Expose a torch.matmul function with semantics of matmul as of PR #1563.
  2. Document above torch.matmul function, including broadcast behavior.
  3. Document that the following functions do not broadcast:
    torch.mm
    torch.mv
    torch.bmm
    torch.dot (this function does flatten)
    torch.ger (this function does not flatten or broadcast).
body_text:
See #1563 (comment) for context.
This will include the following changes:

Expose a torch.matmul function with semantics of matmul as of PR #1563.
Document above torch.matmul function, including broadcast behavior.
Document that the following functions do not broadcast:
torch.mm
torch.mv
torch.bmm
torch.dot (this function does flatten)
torch.ger (this function does not flatten or broadcast).
body:
See https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1563#discussion_r120843916 for context.

This will include the following changes:
1) Expose a torch.matmul function with semantics of __matmul__ as of PR https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1563.
2) Document above torch.matmul function, including broadcast behavior.
3) Document that the following functions do not broadcast:
torch.mm
torch.mv
torch.bmm
torch.dot (this function does flatten)
torch.ger (this function does not flatten or broadcast).
